{
  "gameId": "eae80ff2-6ee6-44c5-a6f7-f8225b171664",
  
  "questionEn": "Who is the main suspect in the murder case?",
  "questionAr": "من هو المشتبه به الرئيسي في قضية القتل؟",
  
  "type": "multiple_choice",
  "points": 15,
  "difficulty": 7,
  "order": 1,
  "isRequired": true,
  "isFinalAccusation": false,
  
  "answers": [
    {
      "answerText": "John Smith",
      "answerTextAr": "جون سميث",
      "isCorrect": true
    },
    {
      "answerText": "Mary Johnson",
      "answerTextAr": "ماري جونسون",
      "isCorrect": false
    },
    {
      "answerText": "Robert Brown",
      "answerTextAr": "روبرت براون",
      "isCorrect": false
    },
    {
      "answerText": "Sarah Davis",
      "answerTextAr": "سارة ديفيس",
      "isCorrect": false
    }
  ],
  
  "hints": [
    {
      "hintName": "Crime Scene Video",
      "hintNameAr": "فيديو مسرح الجريمة",
      "hintDescription": "Watch this video to see the crime scene investigation and gather clues about the suspect.",
      "hintDescriptionAr": "شاهد هذا الفيديو لرؤية التحقيق في مسرح الجريمة وجمع الأدلة حول المشتبه به.",
      "hintType": "video",
      "uploadId": "36f1e077-6596-44bd-81c8-47d96bb23c84",
      "pointsCost": 5
    },
    {
      "hintName": "Evidence Photo",
      "hintNameAr": "صورة الأدلة",
      "hintDescription": "View the collected evidence from the crime scene.",
      "hintDescriptionAr": "عرض الأدلة التي تم جمعها من مسرح الجريمة.",
      "hintType": "image",
      "uploadId": "36f1e077-6596-44bd-81c8-47d96bb23c84",
      "pointsCost": 3
    },
    {
      "hintName": "Witness Statement Document",
      "hintNameAr": "وثيقة شهادة الشاهد",
      "hintDescription": "Read the witness statement document for important information.",
      "hintDescriptionAr": "اقرأ وثيقة شهادة الشاهد للحصول على معلومات مهمة.",
      "hintType": "document",
      "uploadId": "36f1e077-6596-44bd-81c8-47d96bb23c84",
      "pointsCost": 7
    },
    {
      "hintName": "Audio Recording",
      "hintNameAr": "تسجيل صوتي",
      "hintDescription": "Listen to the audio recording from the crime scene.",
      "hintDescriptionAr": "استمع إلى التسجيل الصوتي من مسرح الجريمة.",
      "hintType": "audio",
      "uploadId": "36f1e077-6596-44bd-81c8-47d96bb23c84",
      "pointsCost": 4
    }
  ]
}
